alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:52PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Arapahoe, Denver, northeastern Jefferson and southwestern Adams Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 451 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Westminster to Lakewood, or along a line extending from 36 miles south of Greeley to 8 miles west of Denver. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Denver, Aurora, Lakewood, Arvada, southern Westminster, northern Centennial, southwestern Commerce City, northeastern Littleton, Englewood, Wheat Ridge, Golden, Greenwood Village, Sheridan, Morrison, Arapahoe Park, Watkins and Buckley SFB. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
